name: @alphanull/visionplayer
description: VisionPlayer is a highly modular, lightweight, and feature-rich JavaScript video player for the modern web.

scripts.clean: node -e "if (require('fs').existsSync('./dist')) require('fs').rmSync('./dist', { recursive: true, force: true })"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:headless && npm run build:basic && npm run build:default && npm run build:secure && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:headless: vite build --mode headless:mjs --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js && vite build --mode headless:iife --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js
scripts.build:basic: vite build --mode basic:mjs --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js && vite build --mode basic:iife --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js
scripts.build:default: vite build --mode default:mjs --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js && vite build --mode default:iife --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js
scripts.build:secure: vite build --mode secure:mjs --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js && vite build --mode secure:iife --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js
scripts.build:streaming: vite build --mode streaming:mjs --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js && vite build --mode streaming:iife --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js
scripts.build:dev: vite build --mode dev:mjs --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js && vite build --mode dev:iife --config ./scripts/build/vite.config.js
scripts.lint: echo 'Running ESLint...' && eslint src/** lib/** && echo 'Running Stylelint...' && stylelint assets/scss/**/*.scss
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'Running ESLint FIX...' && eslint src/** lib/** --fix && echo 'Running Stylelint FIX...' && stylelint assets/scss/**/*.scss --fix
